text: Deux-Grosnes is a commune in the Rhône department in eastern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Monsols (the seat), Avenas, Ouroux, Saint-Christophe, Saint-Jacques-des-Arrêts, Saint- Mamert and Trades.Arrêté préfectoral 20 December 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Rhône department ==References== Category:Communes of Rhône (department)
title: Deux-Grosnes
